2+1.sig_info: Ms. Marvel starts to figure out this whole Contest thing, increasing her Fury durations by 2 to 7.5 seconds and increasing the Potency of her Fury effects by 10%.

PASSIVE: As the inexperienced Ms. Marvel gets to know her opponent's fighting style, she better learns to alter her size and avoid incoming damage, increasing Block Proficiency by 102.13 for each Fury effect she has active.
An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: While Ms. Marvel has 3 or more stacks of Fury, her Special Attacks Nulify 2 stacks of her opponent’s Buffs.
HEAVY ATTACKS: While charging her Heavy Attack, Ms. Marvel continually gains stacks of Fury to a max of 3, each increasing her Attack by 18.27 for 10 seconds. These stacks are lost as she is struck during combat.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack triggers up to 4 stacks of Fury, each increasing Attack by 13.92 for 9 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 10 seconds, granting +33.06 Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack has a 90% chance to grant a permanent Fury effect, increasing Attack by 33.06.
